org.drombler.commons.context

Class LocalProxyContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.context.LocalProxyContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context

    public class LocalProxyContext
extends Object
implements Context
    A proxy for local contexts to handle implicit and explicit local contexts. The explicit local context is provided by a LocalContextProvider. Implicit local contexts may be provided by frameworks to associate additional content with an object.
    Author:
    puce
    See Also:
    createLocalProxyContext(java.lang.Object)

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public <T> T find(Class<T> type)
        Finds an instance of the specified type in this context. If this context has more than one instance of the specified type, the first one found will be returned.
        Specified by:
        find in interface Context
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type
        Returns:
        the first instance found in this context with the specified type, or null if no instance was found. TODO: return Optional?

        Finds all instances of the specified type in this context.
        Specified by:
        findAll in interface Context
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type
        Returns:
        a collection with all instances found in this context with the specified type, or an empty collection if no instance was found TODO: return List instead of Collection?

      • addContextListener

        public <T> void addContextListener(Class<T> type,
                                   ContextListener<T> listener)
        Registers a ContextListener for a specified type. The listener will be notified when instances of the specified type get added or removed.
        Specified by:
        addContextListener in interface Context
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the type to listen for
        listener - the ContextListener

      • getExplicitContext

        public Context getExplicitContext()
        Gets the explicit context (provided by a LocalContextProvider.
        Returns:
        the explicit context

      • hasImplicitContext

        public boolean hasImplicitContext()
        Indicates if this local context has some implicit contexts.
        Returns:
        true, if there are implicit contexts, else false.

      • hasExplicitContext

        public boolean hasExplicitContext()
        Indicates if this local context has an explicit context (provided by a LocalContextProvider.
        Returns:
        true, if this local context has an explicit context, else false.

      • createLocalProxyContext

        public static LocalProxyContext createLocalProxyContext(Object obj)
        Creates a new instance of this class for a given object. If the object is an instance of LocalContextProvider, the provided local context will be set as explicit context. Else an instance with no explicit context gets created.
        Parameters:
        obj - the given object.
        Returns:
        a LocalProxyContext for the given object
